title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - First Ladies of the U.S.| Michael Kiwanuka
itunes:title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - First Ladies of the U.S.| Michael Kiwanuka
description:
Fox News slams President Biden for numerous pseudo-scandals, Trevor explores the history of America's first ladies, and singer-songwriter Michael Kiwanuka talks about his album "Kiwanuka."

In honor of Women's History Month, support more women running for public office by visiting dailyshow.com/SheShouldRun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
